text: Nita Sue Melnikoff Lowey (; ; July 5, 1937 - March 15, 2025) was an American politician. She was a U.S. Representative from New York from 1989 to 2021. She was a member of the Democratic Party. Lowey's district was numbered as the 20th from 1989 to 1993, as the 18th from 1993 to 2013, and has been the since 2013. Lowey announced on October 10, 2019 that she would not run for re- election to Congress in 2020.
